RelatedSentence: What was done on Mischief Reef in the past , what 's being done now , all these are seemingly in violation of the agreed Declaration of Conduct , he told reporters after speaking at a conference on tourism and climate change in Legazpi City , Albay province .

He was referring to China 's grabbing Mischief Reef - known in the Philippines as Panganiban Reef - in the West Philippine Sea in 1995 and building a military outpost there as the Philippines watched helplessly .

With Mabini , the problem is that the Declaration of Conduct is not binding , Aquino admitted , referring to observations that the agreement has failed to stop clashes between rival claimants to territory in the South China Sea .

Manila in early April protested Beijing 's reclamation of land on Mabini Reef , believed to be preparation for the construction of an airstrip or an offshore military base .
Beijing rejected the protest outright on grounds that the reef was part of its territory .
